body: @XV71: woah you replied. Is there a notification or something here? Actually the pairing i meant was ymyr. I thought they were a couple. Thanks for your info. I better pick up snk again. :)
I can overlook the NTR in this one pretty easily
@d-dame no they weren't a pairing he was just the most suitable candidate to get her pregnant so she could live

@XV71: this is an AOT parody and if i remember correctly from the few chapters ive read in the original manga, krista has a pairing. I forgot if they were a romantic couple.. If they were a canon couple maybe thats why this duoj is ntr. Not sure
